attributes.action: allow people to claim carers allowance on minimum wage who work 16 hours per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: prior to review (APRIL 2007) if you work 16 hours per week on minmum wage £85.60 YOU WILL EARN $1.40 MORE THUS DISQUALIFYING YOU FROM RECEIVING CARERS ALLOWANCE.  IF YOU WERE TO WORK AN EXTRA 21 HOURS PER WEEK, BRINGING YOU TO 37 HOURS YOU WOULD EARN AT MINIMUM GOVERNMENT WAGE WAGE LEVELS £197.95 WHERE IS THE INCENTIVE OF PEOPLE GIVING UP WORK TO CARE FOR INDIVIDUAL WHEN THEY WILL LOSE OUT EVEN WHEN WORKING TO GOVERNMENT SET LIMITS
